com.icodici.universa.node2

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icodici.universa.node2.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    The v2 Node.

    In v2 node is always the local node. All the rest takes com.icodici.universa.node2.network.Network class.

      • isSanitating

        public boolean isSanitating()

        public java.util.Map<HashId,StateRecord> getRecordsToSanitate()

      • getConfig

        public Config getConfig()

      • registerItem

        public ItemResult registerItem(Approvable item)
        Asynchronous (non blocking) check/register for item from white list. If the item is new and eligible to process with the consensus, the processing will be started immediately. If it is already processing, the current state will be returned. If item is not signed by keys from white list will return ItemResult#UNDEFINED
        Parameters:
        item - to register/check state
        Returns:
        current (or last known) item state

      • registerParcel

        public boolean registerParcel(Parcel parcel)
        Asynchronous (non blocking) parcel (contract with payment) register. Use Node.waitParcel for waiting parcel being processed. For checking parcel parts use Node.waitItem or Node.checkItem after Node.waitParcel with parcel.getPayloadContract().getId() or parcel.getPaymentContract().getId() as params.
        Parameters:
        parcel - to register/check state
        Returns:
        true if Parcel launch to processing. Otherwise exception will be thrown.

      • checkItem

        public ItemResult checkItem(HashId itemId)
        Check the state of the item. This method does not start elections and can be safely called from a client.
        Parameters:
        itemId - item to check
        Returns:
        last known state

      • checkParcelProcessingState

        public Node.ParcelProcessingState checkParcelProcessingState(HashId parcelId)
        Check the parcel's processing state. If parcel is not under processing (not start or already finished) return ParcelProcessingState.NOT_EXIST
        Parameters:
        parcelId - parcel to check
        Returns:
        processing state

      • extendedCheckItem

        @Deprecated
public Binder extendedCheckItem(HashId itemId)
        Deprecated. 

      • resync

        public void resync(HashId id)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Resync the item. This method launch resync process, call to network to know what consensus is or hasn't consensus for the item.
        Parameters:
        id - item to resync
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - with various types

      • waitItem

        public ItemResult waitItem(HashId itemId,
                           long millisToWait)
                    throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
        If the item is being electing, block until the item been processed with the consensus. Otherwise returns state immediately.
        Parameters:
        itemId - item to check or wait for
        millisToWait - is time to wait in milliseconds
        Returns:
        item state
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - for timeout
        java.lang.InterruptedException - for unexpected interrupt

      • waitParcel

        public void waitParcel(HashId parcelId,
                       long millisToWait)
                throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        If the parcel is being processing, block until the parcel been processed (been processed payment and payload contracts).
        Parameters:
        parcelId - parcel to wait for
        millisToWait - is time to wait in milliseconds
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - for timeout
        java.lang.InterruptedException - for unexpected interrupt

      • checkParcelInternal

        protected java.lang.Object checkParcelInternal(HashId parcelId)

      • checkParcelInternal

        protected java.lang.Object checkParcelInternal(HashId parcelId,
                                               Parcel parcel,
                                               boolean autoStart)
        Optimized for various usages, check the parcel, start processing as need, return object depending on the current state. Note that actual error codes are set to the item itself. Use in pair with checkItemInternal() to check parts of parcel.
        Parameters:
        parcelId - parcel's id.
        parcel - provide parcel if need, can be null. Default is null.
        autoStart - - create new ParcelProcessor if not exist. Default is false.
        Returns:
        instance of ParcelProcessor if the parcel is being processed (also if it was started by the call), ItemResult if it is can't be processed.
